-3-
APPRECIATION
I*d like to thank the members of the Public Relations Committee for their
fine cooperation, and to express my sincere appreciation to Betty McKenzie for her
interest and help throughout the year.
Respectfully submitted by,
Marion Corwell
Chairman
COMMITTEE MEMBERS
Thomas J. Aylward
Gertrude G. Broderick
Lillian Brown
